title: Indian Premier League 2017 Schedule
text:
> Buzz Indian Premier League 2017 Schedule: Download updated VIVO IPL 10 complete time table in PDF with venue details Indian Premier League 2017 will begin on April 5, 2017, and come to an end on May 21, 2017. The complete schedule was announced by BCCI. By Aishwarya Krishnan | Updated: March 22, 2017 8:18 PM IST Comments VIVO IPL 10 or Indian Premier League 2017 is just around the corner. The Indian cricket tournament, which has been one of the most watched domestic series, announced the official schedule for VIVO IPL 10 on February 15. However, the municipal elections in Delhi brought in minor changes to the original schedule released by BCCI. Two main matches of April 22, 2017 will be affected by this change, Delhi Daredevils against Mumbai Indians and Rising Pune Supergiant against Sunrisers Hyderabad. As per the IPL 10 match fixtures, tournament is scheduled to kick-off on April 5, 2017, and come to an end on May 21, 2017. The highly awaited domestic tournament, the 10th season of Indian Premier League will see a total of 60 matches played over 47 days in various locations across India. The 2017 IPL timetable released by BCCI has full details on matches, date, match timings and venue. The official IPL 2017 schedule was released on the website of VIVO IPL 10 after much anticipation. However the changes in this timetable were announced on March 20, 2017. As per the original schedule the Delhi Daredevils were set to face Mumbai Indians in their home ground in Delhi at 4 pm while Rising Pune Supergiant played against Sunrisers Hyderabad at 8:00 PM in Pune. However, the MCD elections have changed this scenario and the timing of the Rising Pune Supergiant vs Sunrisers Hyderabad match has been advanced to 4 pm IST. Meanwhile the match between Delhi Daredevils and Mumbai Indians will be played in Mumbai on April 22 at Wankhede Stadium at 8 pm. Variously rumoured schedules of this edition of Indian Premier League were doing the rounds on social media. One particular schedule, which has been viral on WhatsApp, was the most convincing version of the rumoured schedules. However, the official schedule released shows the IPL 9 champions, Sunrisers Hyderabad will host Royal Challengerâ€™s Bangalore in the first match of the series. Is IPL 2017 Schedule released on WhatsApp official? Match Fixtures and Complete Time Table of VIVO IPL 10 go viral Complete Schedule of VIVO IPL 10: Indian Premier League 2017 Time Table, Fixtures & Venue Details 
You can download the Complete Time Table of VIVO IPL 10 in JPEG or PDF by saving this image. The official auction for IPL 2017 will begin on Monday, February 20, 2017. Initially 799 players registered for the Indian Premier League auction. The governing body of Indian Premiere League shortlisted 351 of these players on February 14, 2017. According to a report, There are as many as 122 international players, that includes six players from Associate nations. The eight teams participating in IPL 2017 are defending champions, Sunrisers Hyderabad, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Rising Pune Supergiants, Mumbai Indians, Gujarat Lions, Kings XI Punjab, Kolkata Knight Riders and Delhi Daredevils. Published Date: March 22, 2017 8:17 PM IST | Updated Date: March 22, 2017 8:18 PM IST comment Topics:
